parameters: I am very displeased to hear a lack of communication
from you yet this semester. Need I remind you the only
reason you're actually able to attend school is because
of your father and I? Honestly, Casper, your attitude
needs to shape up or your allowances will be coming to
an end sooner than you'd expect.
I'd also like to inform you that your father and I will
be arriving in Hazelfair on a business trip. I expect
you and your brother to attend dinner with us at
Gourmet Galore next Friday evening at 7:00pm. You
better dress accordingly as this will be a dinner with
Alisae Larou of the Spring Court council, Vorner
Boldsong of the Autumn Court Council and some other
business executives such as Salem Quinnlarâ€™s father,
Should you choose to also disobey my request, I shall
pay a little visit to your old friend's little
business. Her shop has been a bad influence on you and
I can only tolerate it for so long. With that
motivation in mind, please clean yourself up and meet
us no later than 7:00pm on the dot.
Your father and I hope you arrived at school safely and
your first set of classes have gone well. You should
take your studies seriously, this isn't some random
educational institute. It's Hazelfair College. Remember
that and remember who your parents are and how your
actions might reflect that upon us.
Your father has been busy with meetings with the
council but I heard Lady Alisae Larou is in Hazelfair
on some business. Apparently the Vale believes us
residents of the Spring Court are at fault for the
missing dragons, obnoxious claims and I pray that
Alisae can convince them otherwise. I do believe she is
too soft to make such an argumentative defense against
the Autumn Court council but c'est la vie.
However, the reason I am writing to you, my dear son,
so soon is because there has been a request to have you
perform music for a business event next Friday evening
at Gourmet Galore. You were specifically requested due
to your spectacular talents. I merely responded of
course my son will be there and so you shall. Your
father and I both know you'll do well and show how
talented the Ma'Tecota  family is. This is a very big
event and important people will be attending. Play
something classical. Elegant. I will trust your
I've attached some extra funds for your personal
necessities. Good luck and continue to make us proud.
Hey man, I hope all is going well with your studies. I
just wanted to write to you and inform you a lot of
bills for your place have come in but I just paid them
with the allocated funds. I also wanted you to know
there's been some more people lurking around the place
trying to find out where you went. It's odd how curious
people are about you. Maybe you should stay out of the
limelight a bit, eh? It's getting to become more and
more difficult covering your ass. I'm starting to get a
bit concerned, especially by your neighbour.
The place is still in good shape though. I've kept the
plants watered at least and the maids stop by weekly to
tidy up. I also managed to get a new contact for some
interesting goods should you and your buddies there
OH, also, as per the agreement, I paid myself too. I
also have attached your budget sum you set aside for me
to send you every so often.
Anyways, jobs to do, money to make - you know how it
I hope you've been enjoying your first semester of
school! It's so exciting that our daughter is attending
Hazelfair College! We are all beyond proud of you! Do
you even remember Lady Grendal Voulle? She is so proud
and has put together a care package of all your
favourite things. I hope they arrived okay.
The boys are busy bodies as always and have been making
more work around the shop without you. But I know
you'll be home in no time to visit us and see the shop!
All the customers keep asking where our little Haka is
and when to expect her back behind the counter. You
Anyway, you should have received a care package not
just from Grendal but from us here at home too. The
boys even took some time to draw you some cute
pictures. Well, sweetheart, we all hope to see you soon
during your break and look forward to hearing from you!
I assume your studies are going well and you've been
learning lots. I'm sure your father would be proud to
see his son attend the same school he did. I hope it's
going smoothly and you've met some fine future scholars
The estate is being kept in good hands and well off.
The gardens have grown beautiful flowers that span over
the hills. With you gone, the house has been quite
dull. So, I've been doing a bit of deep cleaning in
your father's old study and I found some information
you may find interesting to review in your personal
There is an artifact your father seems to have written
about a lot. It looks almost like a compass and I read
in the newspaper it will be on display during a private
event next Friday held at the Gourmet Galore. It's not
open to the public and only certain members are invited
but perhaps reading up on it will still pique your
I've sent forward a bit of funds to assist you with
your weekly necessities. Should you require anything at
all, please donâ€™t hesitate to write.
Casper Harlowe and Wesley Lockwood, come
Hey, get your hands off of me?!
What is the meaning of this? You have no
We've been framed! Where is the proof that
Various student witnesses claimed to have
seen both of you cause this damage to
school property. By the Dean's authority,
you will clean this up immediately!\n<Campus Security>
This is ridiculous, we weren't even here?
Hmph... Clean this up now. I'm sick of you
rich kids thinking you can get away with
whatever you want... Just get to work.\n<Campus Security>
Hey Chance! Oh man, there's so many cool
Wait... what happened to your room?
Glad you had time to go shopping while also
I didn't do any of that! I was out with
Haka, Casper, Wesley, and John all day?!
Oh, ha ha. Like you don't know...\n<Garen>

I just want to be alone right now.\n<Garen>

You spilled food all over me in the dining
That wasn't me? I was out all day?

We begin our tale with the start of our first semester
in the most prestigious school in the Eufloria Vale,
It's warm colours, students eager to start the new
semester, and with the anticipation of what will await
The beautiful bright sunlight cascades through the
windows of the car. It's quiet though and you realize
no one else is really on the train. It's too early for
Watching the scenery outside, you see the beautiful
hues of autumn start to come into view as you cross
from the Summer Court to the Autumn Court. The
force field between each court blooms around the train
There's so many luscious colours of different leaves
and foliage. It looks like a painting.
You can still see in the distance the Great Elder Tree
as is casts a shadow over the city of Hazelfair... it's
Arriving at Hazelfair, it's so different. It's colder
but there's a sense of comfort.
The Great Elder Tree sits in the center of Hazelfair.
With it's red-brick buildings, beautiful stone roadways.
There is a faint scent of baked goods and hazelnut
You manage to find your way to Hazelfair College with
its finest landscapes, cleanest walkways and entrances,
flourishing flowerbeds and gardens, it's amazing.
What the hell?? You all have got some nerve
obnoxious chaos and damages. You'll be
I swear by my family's name! \n<James>
What even is your last name? \n<John>
... That isn't the point! You better

That must be where the people who have been
